          <title>
            <string language="fr">Miroirs dans un périscope</string>
            <string language="en">Mirrors in a periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel in einem Periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espelhos em um periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Specchi in un periscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθρέφτες σε ένα περισκόπιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espejos en un periscopio</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre les deux miroirs qui font  fonctionner un périscope. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un  exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the two mirrors that make a periscope work.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">périscope</string>
            <string language="en">periscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die zwei Spiegel, die einen
Periscope arbeiten lassen. Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden 
Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra os dois espelhos que fazem 
um periscope trabalhar. Isto pode ser usado em um exercício 
etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i due specchi che fanno 
funzionare un periscope. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο καθρέφτες που κάνουν
μια εργασία περισκοπίων. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε 
μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra los dos espejos que hacen 
que un periscopio trabaja. Esto se puede utilizar en un 
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
